com.opentok.android

Interface Publisher.CameraListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Publisher

    public static interface Publisher.CameraListener
    Monitors when the camera used by the publisher changes.
    See Also:
    Publisher.setCameraListener(CameraListener listener)

      Invoked when the publisher changes the active camera.
